fields.summary: Odd "InternalFailure" Error when Deploying Cloudformation Stack on VPC

comments.body: The attached group-ingress-stack.json template can be used to verify this issue on a non-VPC cloud. The issue was with concurrent creation of security group rules, which is now retried by the EC2 service on error.
[~hspencer], are you able to consistently see that failure? I have not been able to reproduce it.
[~hspencer], just wanted to confirm that with the cloud property change in place this issue cannot be reproduced (and once the duplicate egress rule is removed, as per EUCA-10447)
